DOC.brief_summary: This observational study ass long-term safety Protopic® Ointment treatment atopic dermatitis . Patients whose age are/were < 16 year time first tacrolimus ointment exposure eligible participate . No drug distribute observational trial .
DOC.brief_title: A Pediatric Longitudinal Evaluation Assess Long-Term Safety Protopic Treatment Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.detailed_description: Data collect enrollment every 6 month thereafter either interview , Internet , physician office visit . Each subject follow 10 year study .
DOC.criteria: Subjects first use Protopic® 0.03 % 0.1 % sixteen year age treat least 6 week treatment Atopic dermatitis may enroll study .
